sentences.en: ‘Multimedia’ has been a buzzword in the computer industry for years.
sentences.cn: “多媒体”这个词语在计算机行业里已经流行多年了。

sentences.en: Bancassurance now is a buzzword in China, banks and insurers are eager to step into it.
sentences.cn: 现在银行保险在国内十分流行, 银行和保险机构都迫不及待地想开展这项业务.

sentences.en: Biodiversity was the buzzword of the Rio Earth Summit.
sentences.cn: 生物多样性是里约热内卢地球峰会上的时髦词儿。

sentences.en: E - marketing is the current buzzword.
sentences.cn: 电子营销是现在的时髦词汇.

sentences.en: Since its opening up to the public in 1993, the Internet has become a buzzword worldwide.
sentences.cn: 自1993年因特网对公众开放以来, “网络”已经在世界范围内成为人们所热衷的话题.

sentences.en: The seemingly innocuous Article 17 has a buzzword in European football.
sentences.cn: 这个所谓的17号条款,已经成为欧洲足坛的时髦用语了.

trans.tran_cn: （报刊等的）时髦术语，流行行话
trans.tran_en: a word or phrase from one special area of knowledge that people suddenly think is very important
